data.title: Sidney Hooper Toler Jr.
data.meta_description: Grave site information of Sidney Hooper Toler Jr. (28 Apr 1874 - 12 Feb 1947) at Highland Cemetery in Wichita, Sedgwick, Kansas, United States from BillionGraves | BillionGraves
data.text:
Description

Hooper G. (father of Sidney)

Plot information: Section 4, Lot 145, Grave 11

Burial date: 16 Feb 1906

Sallie (Hooper G.'s wife)

Plot information: Section 4, Lot 145, Grave ?

Burial date: ? May 1941

Sidney (child of Hooper G. and Sallie)

Plot information: Section 4, Lot 145, Grave 10

Burial date: 19 May 1947

Sidney played Charlie Chan in many Charlie Chan movies (late 1930s - mid 1940s). Died of cancer and cremated. Sidney is also listed as Hooper G. Toler, Jr. in some places.

Hooper Pierce - Missing headstone.

Plot information: Section 4, Lot 145, Grave 3

Burial date: 07 Jun 1922

Matt Foster (child of Hooper G. and Sallie, husband of Mable and father of Hooper Pierce) - Missing headstone.

Plot information: Section 4, Lot 145, Grave 1

Burial date: 28 Feb 1930

Mable A. (wife of Matt and mother of Hooper Pierce) - Missing headstone.

Plot information: Section 4, Lot 145, Grave 2

Burial date: 06 Mar 1947

Susan A. (Mother of Hooper G., wife of George W., see below for George)

- the destroyed white headstone material next to the larger headstone includes enough information to determine much of it is Susan's with parts of at least one other headstone

Plot information: Section 4, Lot 145, Grave 12

Burial date: 21 Mar 1881

Buried in a different section of the cemetery.

Hester Ruth Toler Nov 1899 - 30 Apr 1902 - Missing headstone.

Plot information: Section 2, Lot 196, Grave 10.

Burial date: 01 May 1902

Burial elsewhere:

George W. Toler (Father of Hooper G., husband of Susan A.)

Union Cemetery, Kansas City, Jackson County, Missouri

Plot information: 54 Lot 14

Burial unknown at this time:

Edwin C. Toler (child of Hooper G. and Sallie)
